Package org.asteroid

Class Text

java.lang.Object
org.asteroid.Text
public final class Text extends Object
It helps in tasks related to string and character

  • Method Details

    • capitaliseFirstChar

      public static String capitaliseFirstChar(String str)
      It capitalize the first letter of the given string. In this method first the data is converted to lower case and then the first character is converted to upper case
      Parameters:
      str - Value on which operation is to be performed
      Returns:
      The given string with all the char in lower case and First character in upper case.

    • capitaliseEachWord

      public static String capitaliseEachWord(String str)
      It capitalize the first letter in each word in the given string. In this method first the data is converted to lower case and then the first character of each word is converted to upper case.
      Parameters:
      str - Value on which operation is to be performed
      Returns:
      String with every character in lower case other than the first character of each word

    • getIndicesOf

      public static int[] getIndicesOf(String text, char ch)
      Collects all the indices of a given character in the given string. If the given character does not exists in the given string the codes return an empty array.
      Parameters:
      text - String in which the character is to be searched
      ch - Character that is to be searched in the given String
      Returns:
      The indices of the occurrence of the given character in the String

      Parameters:
      sentence - sentence in which word is to be replaced
      word - old word
      newWord - new word
      Returns:
      sentence with all words replaced
